name: BBQ Grill Maker
description:
There's just nothing like the smell of a grill on a warm summer day. If barbecue is your passion, you will love this unique cooking game!

Grill season has started and you are the barbecue chef. Fire has burnt out, ember is at the right temperature and hot grill is ready for you to start the unforgettable barbecue experience.

Choose the meat of your taste and put it on heated grill bars. Watch how juices are trickling down into the glowing ember, producing smoke and sound effects. You can grill the meat on both sides and prepare it just the way you like it – rare, medium rare or well done. However, you should be careful not to burn it. When the meat is done, put it on a plate, add side dishes, sauces and extra toppings of your choice to decorate your tasty meal and satisfy your hungry guests.

After making this delicious meal, you can have fun serving and eating it. You can also play a slide puzzle minigame or take a snapshot of your masterpiece to show it to your family and friends.

Features:
• beautiful high quality HD graphics
• intuitive, easy to use interface
• infinite gameplay with unlimited combinations
• selection of various meats and side dishes like toppings, vegetables, sauces, spices and much more
• screenshots can be saved in your photo gallery
• slide puzzle minigame
• stimulates creativity

Enjoy barbecuing with your family and friends!
